name: Chicken Sausage From Scratch
author: Scott Simmons
summary: Chicken sausage recipes are not commonly found on the web. I had some chicken thighs and was looking for something versatile to do with them.
directions: Combine apple, onion, garlic, tomato paste, sage, celery seed, anise seed, marjoram, allspice, salt, and pepper in a nonstick skillet over medium heat
Cook and stir until softened and fragrant, about 10 minutes
Remove from heat and let cool for 10 minutes
Place chicken thighs in a food processor; pulse until coarsely chopped
Scoop 1/4 cup of the chicken mixture with a large melon baller and form into a patty
Preheat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat
Cook 4 patties until browned and no longer pink in the center, about 5 minutes per side
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
Transfer to a plate; wipe out skillet
